caption.center: Willie D. PENDLEY v. STATE of Alabama.

opinion.attorneys:
Willie D. Pendley, pro se.
Richmond M. Flowers, Atty. Gen., and John C. Tyson, III, Asst. Atty. Gen., opposed.
opinion.opinion_text:
Petition of Willie D. Pendley for certiorari to the Court of Appeals to review and revise the judgment and decision in Pendley v. State, 181 So.2d 624 (6 Div. 52).
Writ denied.
LIVINGSTON, C. J., and MERRILL and HARWOOD, JJ., concur.Page 691
